content: Property HDB BTO 99.co Event Asked by Cindy TanAsked on 16 May 2019How much would be a reasonable sum to spend for a 4 room BTO? I am wondering what is the range that people spend for a 4 room BTO without any opt ins from HDB. With lets say only built ins for the kitchen.2 answersAnswerBump0

Serene TohLevel 5. GeniusUpdated on 20 May 2019This is a difficult question. Cause we have no idea what your taste and expectations are. If you check renovation websites, they typically recommend. $50K for a new BTO, but this is not for luxurious finishes.You can prob go lower if you go for the bare min only. Go check website like quavast, etc. There’s quite a good range of renovationwebsites in Singapore. If you are not touching the bathroom and kitchen, it will reduce the cost quite a bit, except for a few appliance.Do note that typically the cost and any cost quoted by the ID or contractor, will exclude all furniture, kitchen appliances, equipment and light fittings.Take note of the floor finishes rate. A Low per sq foot rate will be quoted for the most basic material. Typically, people won’t chose from this range of tiles, if they are paying for ID.The biggest problem with renovation is the over Budget that comes along with the upgrades that the owners decided on after signing the contract for a basic finishes. So do make sure that you are ok with the finishes before signing.0 comments0
